content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Burnin' Shell was absolutely great from all aspect--the service, food, portion, pricing, and presentation. My girlfriend and I had the Crew Set, which was more than enough for two people with a great assortment of side dishes and appetizers. The servers were very friendly and had taken care of the grilling part. I'd recommend this place to anyone for lunch or dinner with some drinks.
